author: Mike Moraitis
title: 2024 NFL draft: What time will Titans make the 7th pick in Round 1?
text:
Barring a trade, the Tennessee Titans will make their first pick in the 2024 NFL draft on Thursday night when they‚Äôre on the clock at No. 7 overall.
For fans who have to be up early in the morning for work or whatever else, this is good news, as the Titans‚Äô selection will come fairly early in the evening. However, you may not want to go to sleep after that, as it‚Äôs not out of the question that the Titans trade back into the first round, although that isn‚Äôt likely to happen.
But exactly what time will the Titans make their first-round pick? Well, we can get a good idea by looking at when the No. 7 overall pick came down in previous years.
Over the last five years, four of the No. 7 picks have come between 9:05 p.m. ET and 9:11 p.m. ET, with two of them coming at exactly 9:08 p.m. ET. Only one of the previous five came before 9 p.m. ET (2022: 8:55 p.m. ET).
Now, a look at the exact times the 7th pick in the NFL draft has been made in each of the past five years.
2019 ‚Äì 9:08 p.m. ET With the #7 overall pick in the 2019 @NFLDraft , the @Jaguars select LB @JoshAllen41_ ! #NFLDraft (by @Bose ) pic.twitter.com/6Y3yOUU6g9
‚Äî NFL (@NFL) April 26, 2019
2020 ‚Äì 9:11 p.m. ET With the No. 7 overall pick in the 2020 #NFLDraft , the @Panthers select @AuburnFootball DT Derrick Brown!
(by @Bose ) pic.twitter.com/i89PeqSlJK
‚Äî NFL (@NFL) April 24, 2020
2021 ‚Äì 9:11 p.m. ET With the No. 7 overall pick in the 2021 @NFLDraft , the @Lions select OL Penei Sewell!
üì∫: 2021 #NFLDraft on NFLN/ESPN/ABC pic.twitter.com/mCfS3tUgVW
‚Äî NFL (@NFL) April 30, 2021
2022 ‚Äì 8:55 p.m. ET With the No. 7 overall pick in the 2022 @NFLDraft , the @Giants select Evan Neal! @NewEraCap | #TogetherBlue
üì∫: 2022 #NFLDraft on NFLN/ESPN/ABC pic.twitter.com/vpt5m6IPWl
‚Äî NFL (@NFL) April 29, 2022
2023 - 9:05 p.m. ET With the No. 7 overall pick in the 2023 @NFLDraft , the @Raiders select Tyree Wilson! @NewEraCap | #RaiderNation
üì∫: 2023 #NFLDraft on NFLN/ESPN/ABC
üì±: Stream on NFL+ https://t.co/D3EqkrKdIw pic.twitter.com/qyhUdNk5mn
‚Äî NFL (@NFL) April 28, 2023

author: WND News Services
title: Trump condemns 'persecution' of Christians under Biden DOJ
text: Editor's note: This story originally was published by [The Daily Signal.] By Tyler O'Neil The Daily Signal Advertisement - story continues below NASHVILLE, TENNESSEE‚Äî Former President Donald Trump compared the criminal indictments he faces to the Biden administration‚Äôs targeting of Christians as he spoke at the National Religious Broadcasters Convention Thursday night. ‚ÄúFor all Americans, but especially for Christians, nothing is more important than to defeat this wicked system and to return to equal and impartial justice under the constitutional rule of law,‚Äù the former president said. TRENDING: 'Hey you guys!' Blinken warns State staffers to avoid words like 'father' ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre weaponizing law enforcement to target parents, conservatives, and Catholics,‚Äù Trump noted, citing the (since-rescinded) Department of Justice memo targeting concerned parents of public school children in 2021 and the memo from the FBI‚Äôs Richmond, Virginia, office urging investigations into ‚Äú radical-traditional Catholic hate groups,‚Äù citing the Southern Poverty Law Center. ‚ÄúCatholics, they‚Äôre being persecuted. Catholics,‚Äù he repeated. ‚ÄúBut evangelicals, they‚Äôre all on the list.‚Äù Advertisement - story continues below Get the hottest, most important news stories on the Internet ‚Äì delivered FREE to your inbox as soon as they break! Take just 30 seconds and sign up for WND's Email News Alerts! He pledged that if he wins the 2024 presidential election, ‚ÄúNever again will the federal government be used to target you, religious believers.‚Äù He promised to open an inquiry into ‚Äúevery political prisoner who has been unjustly prosecuted‚Äù under the Biden administration. ‚ÄúThe same DOJ that dropped charges against Antifa, where they killed people, where they destroyed cities ‚Ä¶ the same Biden DOJ has rounded up six pro-life activists right here in Tennessee, arresting them for a peaceful protest outside a clinic, where they prayed, sang hymns, and were removed with great force,‚Äù Trump said. He noted that these protesters got ‚Äúconvicted on outrageous charges.‚Äù Advertisement - story continues below The former president was referring to pro-life activists Chet Gallagher, Coleman Boyd, Heather Idoni, Cal Zastrow, Dennis Green, and Paul Vaughn, who were convicted and face up to 11 years in prison due to their peaceful protest in the hallway outside a Mount Juliet abortion facility in March 2021. Last month, a Nashville grand jury found them guilty of violating the Freedom of Access to Clinic Entrances Act and conspiracy against rights. ‚ÄúThese are persecuted Christians. They are being persecuted by Joe Biden and his people,‚Äù the former president said. Trump promised to defend Christian symbols and to launch a task force to combat ‚Äúanti-Christian bias.‚Äù Advertisement - story continues below ‚ÄúNo one will be touching the cross of Christ under the Trump administration, I swear to you,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI will never allow the Big Media or left-wing pressure groups to silence you.‚Äù ‚ÄúRemember, every communist regime throughout history has tried to stomp out the churches just as every fascist regime has tried to co-opt them,‚Äù he said, claiming that the Left today is using both strategies. Trump also repeated his claim that his opponents target him because they‚Äôre trying to get at the American people. Advertisement - story continues below ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre not after me; they‚Äôre after you, and I just happen to be standing in the way,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThey try to shame Christians; they try to shame us,‚Äù Trump said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm a very proud Christian, actually.‚Äù ‚ÄúI‚Äôm being indicted for you,‚Äù he added. Then the former president joked about facing more criminal charges than great criminals of the past. Advertisement - story continues below ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been indicted more than Al Capone, the great gangster,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been indicted more than some of the greatest criminals in history.‚Äù He joked that every time ‚Äúmy plane flies over a blue state,‚Äù he receives a summons to go to court. Yet ‚Äúwith me, I get indicted and my Advertisement - story continues below Trump warned that Christians ‚Äúcan‚Äôt afford to sit on the sidelines in this fight. The corrupt persecution by this regime will not stop with me.‚Äù ‚ÄúUltimately, the radical Left is coming after all of us because our allegiance is not to them,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúOur allegiance is to our creator, they don‚Äôt want to hear that. ‚Ä¶ We do not answer to bureaucrats in Washington, we answer to God in heaven.‚Äù ‚ÄúHow any Christian or person of faith could vote for a Democrat is crazy,‚Äù Trump added. He said the greatest threat to America comes from within, and he said America cannot prevail without God‚Äôs help. Advertisement - story continues below ‚ÄúTo achieve victory in this fight, just like the victories of the past, we still need the hand of our Lord and the grace of almighty God,‚Äù the former president said. Editor's note: This story originally was published by [The Daily Signal.] SUPPORT TRUTHFUL JOURNALISM. MAKE A DONATION TO THE NONPROFIT WND NEWS CENTER. THANK YOU!

author: Miriam Cos Manuel
title: Los padres de uno de los soldados fallecidos en unas maniobras en C√≥rdoba denuncian al capit√°n y toda la cadena de mando
text: Los padres de Carlos Le√≥n, el soldado natural de El Viso del Alcor ( [Sevilla](https://www.20minutos.es/minuteca/sevilla/)) muerto el pasado 21 de diciembre en unas maniobras militares en Cerro Muriano ( [C√≥rdoba](https://www.20minutos.es/minuteca/cordoba/)), presentar√°n este viernes una denuncia contra el capit√°n al mando del ejercicio y toda la cadena de mando. Seg√∫n ha explicado el abogado sevillano Luis Romero, que se encarga de representar a los padres, la denuncia ser√° registrada este viernes en el juzgado de Instrucci√≥n n√∫mero 4 de C√≥rdoba, donde ya se ha presentado como acusaci√≥n particular. La intenci√≥n de la denuncia es delimitar las posibles responsabilidades del capit√°n y resto de mandos en la muerte del joven sevillano, de 24 a√±os, y el cabo Miguel √Ångel Jim√©nez And√∫jar. El suceso tuvo lugar a primera hora de la ma√±ana cuando se estaban llevando a cabo unas maniobras militares en un entorno acu√°tico con temperaturas de hasta 4 grados, concretamente en una zona junto al embalse de Guadanu√±o, que forma parte de las instalaciones militares. El grupo de militares estaban llevando a cabo un "programa b√°sico de instrucci√≥n" en el medio acu√°tico consistente en la flotabilidad con equipamiento, mientras que se trata de confirmar las causas que motivaron la dispersi√≥n de los soldados en un momento dado. El primer operativo para socorrer a los militares logr√≥ rescatar a dos de ellos, que tuvieron que ser atendidos por el equipo m√©dico debido a "s√≠ntomas de hipotermia", y de inmediato se activ√≥ el protocolo de b√∫squeda de los otros dos soldados que se dieron por desaparecidos. Hasta la base militar cordobesa llegaron efectivos de la [ Guardia Civil](https://www.20minutos.es/minuteca/guardia-civil/), que comandaron la b√∫squeda en una zona pantanosa a la que se unieron miembros del Grupo Especial de Actividades Subacu√°ticas del Instituto Armado (GEAS). El soldado sevillano ingres√≥ en el Ej√©rcito de Tierra el pasado 8 de mayo y estaba tambi√©n destinado en el Regimiento de Infanter√≠a La Reina 2.

author: Julio Cabral e Alessandro Reis
title: Boa parte dos carros 0 km vai escapar do rod√≠zio em SP j√° em 2025
text: Por Julio Cabral e Alessandro Reis A partir de 2025, muitos autom√≥veis novos em S√£o Paulo estar√£o isentos do rod√≠zio municipal de ve√≠culos. Danilo Verpa/Folhapress A maioria dos carros zero-quil√¥metro comercializados no Brasil ter√° tecnologia h√≠brida para cumprir os novos limites de emiss√µes do Proconve L8. 3.out.2023-Bruno Escolastico/Ato Press/Estad√£o Conte√∫do Desde 2015, ve√≠culos h√≠bridos e el√©tricos est√£o isentos do rod√≠zio por emitirem menos polui√ß√£o. F√°bio Vieira/Foto Rua/Estad√£o Conte√∫do O Proconve L8, que entra em vigor em 2025, estabelecer√° normas de emiss√µes mais rigorosas, com etapas mais exigentes previstas para 2027, 2029 e 2031. Reinaldo Canato/UOL O Programa Mobilidade Verde e Inova√ß√£o (Mover), rec√©m-aprovado, incentivar√° a pesquisa e o desenvolvimento de tecnologias de descarboniza√ß√£o com benef√≠cios fiscais. WERTHER SANTANA/ESTAD√ÉO CONTE√öDO O Mover prev√™ a isen√ß√£o de impostos para pe√ßas importadas n√£o dispon√≠veis no mercado nacional, facilitando a produ√ß√£o de ve√≠culos eletrificados. ALOISIO MAURICIO/FOTOARENA/FOTOARENA/ESTAD√ÉO CONTE√öDO Montadoras anunciam investimentos significativos para a produ√ß√£o de novos ve√≠culos h√≠bridos e el√©tricos. Getty Images/iStockphoto Carros com tecnologia micro-h√≠brida, que utilizam pequenos geradores para reduzir o consumo de combust√≠vel, ganhar√£o popularidade. Janaina Garcia/UOL A Companhia de Engenharia de Tr√°fego n√£o planeja mudar a isen√ß√£o para ve√≠culos h√≠bridos e el√©tricos, que ainda representam uma pequena parcela da frota. Roberto Costa/C√≥digo19/Estad√£o Conte√∫do Segundo a ABVE, carros h√≠bridos podem reduzir as emiss√µes de poluentes entre 30% e 70%, com os micro-h√≠bridos se destacando pelo menor custo e efici√™ncia. Zanone Fraissat/Folhapress Para mais informa√ß√µes, acesse UOL Carros. Marco Ambrosio/Estad√£o Conte√∫do Veja aqui Publicado em 04 de julho de 2024. Comunicar Erro

title: Virospack obtiene una calificaci√≥n B en el CDP Climate Disclosure
text:
Virospack obtiene una calificaci√≥n B en el CDP Climate Disclosure
Virospack ha recibido una calificaci√≥n B en la evaluaci√≥n CDP Climate Disclosure, reconociendo sus esfuerzos en transparencia y acci√≥n clim√°tica. Este resultado refleja el compromiso de la empresa con la reducci√≥n de emisiones y la mejora de la eficiencia energ√©tica en la industria del envasado cosm√©tico.
